City Council Votes to Call DART Election In May
-----------------------------------------------

Published on January 30, 2026

At its January 27 regular meeting, the Addison City Council voted to call an election that will allow residents to decide whether the Town should remain in or withdraw from DART.](https://www.addisontx.gov/News-articles/2026-News/DART-Election "City Council Votes to Call DART Election In May")
[![](https://www.addisontx.gov/files/sharedassets/main/v/1/marketing/images/news-2026/people-getting-off-a-dart-bus-at-addison-circle.jpg?dimension=homepagelisting&w=690&h=378)

DART Election to Be Considered at Upcoming City Council Meeting
---------------------------------------------------------------

Published on January 19, 2026

At the January 13 City Council Work Session, Council discussed the Town’s participation in Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART). Council directed staff to place an item on the January 27 agenda to consider calling an election that would allow Addison residents to vote on remaining in or withdrawing from DART.](https://www.addisontx.gov/News-articles/2026-News/DART-Election-to-Be-Considered-at-Upcoming-City-Council-Meeting "DART Election to Be Considered at Upcoming City Council Meeting")
[![](https://www.addisontx.gov/files/content/main/v/2/news-articles/council-candidate-packets-available/candidate-packets25.png?dimension=homepagelisting&w=690&h=378)

Council Candidate Packets Available Jan. 14 - Feb. 13
-----------------------------------------------------

Published on January 08, 2026

Thinking about running for Addison Council? Now is your chance! Pick up your council packet at Addison Town Hall anytime between January 14 and February 13, 2026. The first day to file is January 14 and the final day is February 13. Step up, get involved, and make an impact!](https://www.addisontx.gov/News-articles/Council-Candidate-Packets-Available "Council Candidate Packets Available Jan. 14 - Feb. 13")
[View More News](https://www.addisontx.gov/News-articles)

------------

Are you heading out of town for the holidays? Make sure to submit a Close Patrol form so Addison APD can keep a close watch on your home while you are gone.](https://police.addisontx.gov/Services/myAPD/Close-Patrol)
